name: brainfucker.js
description: brainfuck JS interpreter for node and browsers

scripts.web: mkdir -p web && cat src/brainfucker.js src/bf-loader.js |grep -v require |grep -v exports | sed -e 's/\/\/\+\+//' > web/brainfucker.js && uglifyjs web/brainfucker.js -c -m -o web/brainfucker.min.js

author: Fernando Iazeolla
